articles.title: WHO switches to Greek alphabet for virus variant names - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Under the new system, the variants of concern take on the following names: the hitherto so-called British variant B.1.1.7 becomes Alpha; the B.1.351 first discovered in South Africa becomes Beta, while the Brazilian P.1 becomes Gamma.
